content: Thirty-five bales of hay. A smattering of silverware. Cast-off business attire. A guitar. These are just a few of the many unwanted items Stanford University sustainability waste specialist Haley Todd has recovered on campus as part of Residential & Dining Enterprisesâ€™ (R&DE) efforts toreduce, reuse, recycle, or compost materials that might otherwise end up in a trash bin.
